cs.NI, cs.IT, cs.MM, cs.SY, cs.LG 

This paper is likely to belong to the arXiv CS sub-category of cs.NI (Networking and Internet Architecture) as it focuses on the development of a MAC-layer algorithm for Intelligent Transportation Systems (ITSs) that utilizes information broadcast via DSRC beacons by all vehicles. Additionally, the paper discusses the potential of mmWave systems for multi-gigabit-per-second communications in future ITSs, which is a topic that falls under the scope of cs.NI. 

The paper also touches on topics related to information theory and communication systems, which are covered in the arXiv CS sub-category of cs.IT (Information Theory). 

Furthermore, the paper discusses the use of mmWave systems, which is a topic that falls under the scope of cs.MM (Multimedia). 

The paper also proposes a new algorithm for beam alignment, which is a topic that falls under the scope of cs.SY (Systems and Control). 

Finally, the paper discusses the performance of the proposed algorithm, which involves data analysis and machine learning techniques, which are covered in the arXiv CS sub-category of cs.LG (Machine Learning).
